title: Microsoft Office 2016 ProPlus Select Edition (x64) Sept 11, 2018
description:
* About this release

Microsoft Office 2016 VL Select Edition allows a fully customized installation of Office 2016.

1. The full version of MS Office 2016 Professional Edition, which includes: Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook, Publisher, Skype for Business, Office Online (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote)
2. Any of these standalone Office Professional 2016 applications: Access, Excel, Outlook, Powerpoint, Project Pro, Publisher, Visio Pro, Word, Skype for Business

* Release Info

- Language: English (en-US)
- Proofing Tools: English, French, Spanish
- Channel: Volume License
- Version: 16.0.4738.1000
- OS: Windows 10/8.1/8/7 SP1 + Windows 10 Server, Server 2012 R2/2012/2008 R2 (64-bit only)
- 64-bit version runs on 64-bit systems only
- Updated September 11, 2018

* Customized default setup (slightly modified using OCT - Office Customization Tool)

- Skip EULA
- Shortcuts - Office 2016 by default decides to put all of the shortcuts on the start menu WITHOUT a subdirectory – splattered all over the start menu. The included setup customization files place all shortcuts for Office 2016 suites and single applications into a subdirectory Microsoft Office 2016, and Office tools into a subdirectory Tools
- Default setup options- all programs and features will be installed by default, except for Skype for Business (Office 2016 ProPlus) and Office Telemetry  (Office 2016 suites / applications) - you can obviously modify all setup options as you wish

* Bonus folder

- Office uninstallers by Microsoft for Office 2016, 2013, 365, 2003, 2007, 2010
- KMSpico 10.2.0 + Microsoft Toolkit 2.6.4
- Classic Menu for Office 9.25 (adds Office 2003 type toolbars and menus to Office 2016)
- Office Tab Enterprise 12.0.0.228 (adds tabs to Word, PowerPoint, and Excel documents)
- Disable/Restore 'Sign In' option in Office applications (reg file)
- Disable/Restore Office 2016 Telemetry (reg file)
- ShellNewHandler (easily remove New Microsoft_xxxx document from Windows Explorer context menu)
